text: Elitserien () is the men's bandy top division of Sweden since the 2007â€“2008 season. It consist of 14 teams, and is followed up by the Swedish championships playoffs, ending with one single final game. ==Season structure== The season starts with a regular season comprising 14 teams and 26 rounds. The first eight teams qualify for the quarter finals, the eleventh and twelfth plays a relegation round robin tournament against teams from the Allsvenskan and the last two teams are relegated. ==Other websites== * Swedish Bandy Association Category:2007 establishments in Sweden Category:Bandy in Sweden
title: Elitserien (bandy)
